description: Maps VG type and Cable ID to a Cable Type

schema.name: product_id
schema.description: The internal ID of the Samsara product

schema.name: cable_id
schema.description: The cable id for the onboard diagnostic port (OBD) /n/n [Cable IDs](https://github.com/samsara-dev/firmware/blob/5c4bcb202d56008af10811b383afe14b07ce2840/samsara/go/src/firmware.samsaradev.io/platform/cableid.go#L138)

schema.name: type
schema.description: The name of the cable for the Samsara product. Note: In some cases for older cables, one or more cable types can map to a cable_id depending on factors like make, model etc.,

schema.name: has_modi_or_override
schema.description: A boolean flag (i.e., 'true' or 'false) indicating whether a modi hw or a device/org JSON override is required for the cable type to operate with the product

schema.name: diagnostics_capable
schema.description: A boolean flag indicating if a given cable and product combination support diagnostics. Power only cables, for example, do not support diagnostics.
